content.raw:
Yes, it was part of the pull request, and that is why I am surprised to be re-opened:

[#!/osrf/subt/pull-requests/377/model-submission-for-x2-sensor/activity#comment-128133499](#!/osrf/subt/pull-requests/377/model-submission-for-x2-sensor/activity#comment-128133499)

or directly:

[https://www.intelrealsense.com/depth-camera-d435i/](https://www.intelrealsense.com/depth-camera-d435i/)

‌

```
Depth Field of View (FOV):
87°±3° x 58°±1° x 95°±3°
Depth Output Resolution & Frame Rate:
Up to 1280 x 720 active stereo depth resolution. Up to 90 fps.
```

Note, that we used half resolution \(640 x 360\) to better match existing 640 x 480 to avoid simulation overhead.

Yes, it was part of the pull request, and that is why I am surprised to be re-opened:

#!/osrf/subt/pull-requests/377/model-submission-for-x2-sensor/activity#comment-128133499

or directly:

https://www.intelrealsense.com/depth-camera-d435i/

‌

Depth Field of View (FOV):
87°±3° x 58°±1° x 95°±3°
Depth Output Resolution & Frame Rate:
Up to 1280 x 720 active stereo depth resolution. Up to 90 fps.

Note, that we used half resolution (640 x 360) to better match existing 640 x 480 to avoid simulation overhead.
